about_the_game:
Bring a little extra bling to your favorite weapons in Borderlands 3 with the Gold Weapon Skins Pack, available to those who pre-order. This pack contains a gold weapon trinket and gold weapon skins that are applicable to all guns in the game.

*REQUIRES BORDERLANDS 3 (sold separately) ON STEAM TO UTILIZE OFFER. ONE PER STEAM ACCOUNT. OFFER EXPIRES AT 10:00AM PST ON 4/1/20. TERMS APPLY.
